law.catch_line: The purposes of this part are to:...
law.text:
The purposes of this part are to:
establish a system of executive and legislative evaluation of regulations that will:
determine whether the regulations of a unit:
continue to be necessary for the public interest;
continue to be supported by statutory authority and judicial opinions; and
are obsolete or otherwise are appropriate for amendment or repeal; and
assist the Executive Branch in being accountable and responsive to the public interest; and
assure that the evaluation takes place in a timely and orderly manner.
